participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, she is passionate about her goals and dreams.
participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adventurous, he enjoys thrilling activities and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: my favorite food is mexican food. i am a construction worker. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith.
